title: Hannah Elliott (Bloomberg Autos)
description:
What a show! Hannah Elliott covers automobiles and motorcycles for Bloomberg. In this conversation we cover her experience at Pebble Beach Concours d'Elegance 2021 (and how it's changing), driving the new  and extremely rare Bentley Mulliner Bacalar, what's happening in the world of hypercar electrification, daily driving an old Rolls-Royce, old Ferraris, and a lot more. 

@hannahelliottxo

https://www.bloomberg.com/authors/AR_gYx13m9A/hannah-elliott
